sources.title: Devil Diamond
sources.description: A group of thugs tries to steal the cursed title gem from a jeweler who has been hired to cut it into small, saleable pieces. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Devil Diamond
sources.description: Title: The Devil Diamond Summary: A group of thugs tries to steal the cursed title gem from a jeweler who has been hired to cut it into small, saleable pieces. Directed by: Leslie Goodwins Actors: Frankie Darro, Kane Richmond, June Gale Production Company: Conn Pictures Corporation Release Date: 15 January 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A group of thugs tries to steal the cursed title gem from a jeweler who has been hired to cut it into small, saleable pieces.

sources.title: Devil Diamond
sources.description: A group of thugs tries to steal the cursed title gem from a jeweler who has been hired to cut it into small, saleable pieces.

sources.title: The Devil Diamond (1937) CRIME THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: Frankie Darro, Kane Richmond, June Gale
Director: Leslie Goodwins

A gang of thugs plan to steal a legendary diamond before a jeweler can break the curse by cutting the gem into smaller pieces!

sources.title: The Devil Diamond (1937) Action, Adventure, Crime Full Length Movie
